column4: can I modify a group membership so that it takes effect without the user logging out and back in?

as a  quick 'work around' you could relogin that user in a terminal (with login, or ssh to localhost)   and have the proper groups in that terminal window only... but  eventually you need to log out/backin to get it fully set.

theres login shells, then theres normal shells..  :) then i guess theres how 'login' command works. or ssh does when it connects.. I jsut use this trick every so often when setting up fuse normally
